content: description this pattern is a free printable bring groovy vibes to your next project with this 70s-inspired granny square featuring a bold floral center and vibrant color changes in every round the retro bloom square is perfect for afghans bags and more this easy-level pattern is beginner-friendly fun to make and comes with a free printable yarn worsted/aran weight yarn in 5 shades yarn a avocado green yarn b burnt orange yarn c chocolate brown yarn d mustard yellow yarn e creamy white tools crochet hook size 5mm h/8 yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors blocking mat and pins optional skill level basic/beginner
